com.twilio4j.twiml
Class Play

java.lang.Object
  com.twilio4j.twiml.TwiML
      com.twilio4j.twiml.Play
All Implemented Interfaces:
NestInGather, ToXML
public class Play
extends TwiML
implements NestInGather

This class directly reflects the Play verb documented at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/play All of the descriptions included in these javadoc comments come directly from the twilio website.

Author:
broc.seib@gentomi.com

Constructor Detail

Play

public Play(java.lang.String audioUrl)

The 'Play' verb plays an audio file back to the caller. Twilio retrieves the file from a URL that you provide.

Parameters:
audioUrl - The URL of an audio file that Twilio will retrieve and play to the caller.

Method Detail

toXml

public void toXml(java.lang.StringBuilder buf,
                  java.lang.String baseUrl)
Converts this object into XML. This function is normally called by the state machine servlet and not called directly by you.

Specified by:
toXml in interface ToXML
Overrides:
toXml in class TwiML

loop

public Play loop(int loopCount)
The 'loop' attribute specifies how many times the audio file is played. The default behavior is to play the audio once. Specifying '0' will cause the the verb to loop until the call is hung up.

Parameters:
loopCount - must be >=0. default is 1.
Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

getAudioUrl

public java.lang.String getAudioUrl()
Getter for the audioUrl set in the constructor.

Returns:
the audioUrl set in the constructor.

getLoop

public java.lang.Integer getLoop()
Getter for the loop attribute.

Returns:
the loop attribute, only if it was set.
